name: Inflection Point Ventures
description: Inflection Point Ventures was started in 2018 with the aim of driving exponential value creation by being India’s most accessible & efficient network connecting a diverse investor community with a carefully set of curated startups. IPV is an early-stage angel investing platform, which provides both monetary and non-monetary support to the startups, as well as complete transparency around valuation, findings during due diligence, and personal interest (if any) to its investors. Today, it has 7000+ angel investors, with the community having expanded beyond CXOs to include HNIs who come from varied backgrounds, professions and areas of expertise. IPV caters to investors pan India, and overseas, giving them access to startups and deals, making the group location and region agnostic.
features: Startups not only get a cheque but also mentoring support through initiatives like ‘Expert Panel’
A Single Point of Contact is provided to the Startup to help with digitized processes
Streamlined fundraising process facilitates quicker fundraising, without multiple meetings

Highlights.name: Largest CXO/ Professional network
Highlights.description: IPV boasts a large network of investors [1]. This means that startups are more likely to find investors who are a good fit for their business. A large and qualified investor network is a significant advantage for any investment platform.

Highlights.name: Viable investment alternative
Highlights.description: IPV has helped startups raise over 569 crores in the past year [1]. This suggests that IPV is a successful platform that can help startups raise the capital they need. With this track record, IPV can be seen as a viable alternative to other funding methods for startups.

Highlights.name: Transparency through the investment process
Highlights.description: Transparency is crucial during the investment process. The document mentions that IPV is transparent throughout the investment process [1]. This likely means that both startups and investors have a clear understanding of the investment terms and conditions.

enhanced_description: Inflection Point Ventures, established in 2018, is an early-stage angel investing platform dedicated to fostering exponential value creation by efficiently connecting a diverse community of over 7000 angel investors (including CXOs and HNIs from varied backgrounds across India and overseas) with carefully curated startups. The platform offers both monetary support through investment cheques and non-monetary assistance, such as mentoring via its 'Expert Panel' initiatives. It ensures complete transparency throughout the investment process, providing investors with clear insights into valuation, due diligence findings, and any personal interests. IPV streamlines the fundraising journey for startups by offering a single point of contact and facilitating a quicker fundraising process, without the need for multiple meetings. Recognized as a viable investment alternative, Inflection Point Ventures has a proven track record of helping startups raise over 569 crores, and uniquely allows investors to begin their startup investment journey with as low as ₹1 lakh. While primarily an investment platform, its non-monetary support and expert network indirectly contribute to HR-related business objectives for the startups it funds, such as talent acquisition, employee development, and engagement.
